H0.text: The respiratory system works along with the skeletal system by assisting movement and maintaining posture.

H1.text: Circulatory is the system that works along with the skeletal system by assisting movement and maintaining posture.

H2.text: Muscular is the system of the human body that works along with the skeletal system by assisting movement and maintaining posture.

H3.text: Digestive is the system of the human body that works along with the skeletal system by assisting movement and maintaining posture.

A4.text: Together with the skeletal system in the human, it forms the musculoskeletal system, which is responsible for the movement of the body.

A5.text: It permits movement of the body, maintains posture, and circulates blood throughout the body.
